description: Sweet-savory teriyaki chicken over rice with broccoli and carrots, paired with miso soup.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Teriyaki Chicken Bowls, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Sweet-savory teriyaki chicken over rice with broccoli and carrots, paired with miso soup.. Scene: japanese-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: A captivating, close-up, eye-level shot of a Teriyaki Chicken Bowl. Succulent, caramelized chicken thighs glisten atop steaming, fluffy rice, artfully arranged with vibrant green broccoli florets and bright orange carrot ribbons. Garnished with diagonal green onion slices and toasted sesame seeds. A small bowl of aromatic miso soup sits beside it. Bathed in soft, warm natural daylight, highlighting gentle steam and shallow depth of field for an inviting, homemade feel.
